charity.headline: Non-profit Domains for the HIV response

companies.headline: .hiv Best Practice & Click Champions
companies.text: .hiv domains offer uncountable usage models. Come and browse through some of the most innovative ideas, useful applications and successful deployments. Get inspired!

latest.text: These domain names are just joining the .hiv family:
latest.title: .hiv domain ticker

launch.text1: In 2008 ICANN introduced a new generation of Top-Level Domains- just over 6 years later, the realisation of the digital red ribbon is a fact. Here is a summary of our final steps until the Go-Live. Further behind,

menu.icann: A member of the global Internet Community

nonprofit.text1b: The .hiv non-profit Domain is non-profit in two ways: first and foremost, the Domain is exclusively awarded to non-profit Organizations whose focus point is HIV and AIDS. Moreover, the non-profit Domain is free for these Organizations- the cost of which is beared by dotHIV. The aim is to create a thematic network, through the Internet, of HIV and AIDS Intiatives.
nonprofit.text2: .hiv non-profit Domain is non-profit in two ways: first and foremost, the Domain is exclusively awarded to non-profit Organizations whose focus point is HIV and AIDS. Moreover, the non-profit Domain is free for these Organizations- the cost of which is beared by dotHIV. The aim is to create a thematic network, through the Internet, of HIV and AIDS Intiatives.

RA.text: Wie bei jeder Top-Level Domain bildet auch bei .hiv das Registry Agreement mit ICANN die Grundlage für den Ver- und Betrieb der Domains. Bei dotHIV steht die gemeinnützige Leitorganisation der Initiative, der dotHIV gemeinnützige e.V., in diesem zentralen Vertragsverhältnis. Die dotHIV Registry managt das operative Geschäft im Auftrag des Vereins, ein Lizenzvertrag regelt das Geschäftsverhältnis.

registrars.text1: By offering the .hiv Top-Level Domain, registrars add a one of a kind domain product to their portfolio. Here, you can find key info on .hiv at a glance as well as more on on-boarding and cooperation.

whois.headline: .hiv Whois
whois.text1: This little window will tell you, if the .hiv domain of your dreams is still free, and who is running any specific .hiv website out there. Go try it out:
